channel.title: Finance
channel.description: Latest investing news and finance headlines straight from Wall Street.

item.title: Wage inflation has arrived in a big way and Jamie Dimon says CEOs 'shouldn't be crybabies about it'
item.description: There is the risk that runaway inflation could actually wipe out the finance industry's gains from higher interest rates, according to JPMorgan's CFO.

item.title: Stocks making the biggest moves midday: JPMorgan, Wynn Resorts, Sherwin-Williams, Disney and more
item.description: These are the stocks posting the largest moves in midday trading.

item.title: Stocks making the biggest moves premarket: BlackRock, Wells Fargo, Sherwin-Williams
item.description: These are the stocks posting the largest moves before the bell.

item.title: Wells Fargo's fourth-quarter revenue tops estimate, profit jumps
item.description: The fourth biggest U.S. bank by assets posted quarterly revenue that exceeded analysts' expectations.

item.title: JPMorgan shares fall 6% after CFO lowers guidance on 'headwindsâ€™ including wage inflation
item.description: The bank's CFO issued guidance Friday, saying he expected "headwinds" of higher expenses and moderating Wall Street revenue to cause returns to dip.

item.title: Here's the full list of the best-selling electric cars in China for 2021
item.description: Tesla and BYD remained market leaders in China's electric car market last year, while new competitors emerged, according to the China Passenger Car Association.

item.title: Citi to sell consumer business in Malaysia, Indonesia, Thailand and Vietnam to UOB Group
item.description: UOB said it will acquire Citi's unsecured and secured lending portfolios, wealth management and retail deposit units in the four Southeast Asian markets.

item.title: China's December exports rose 20.9% from a year ago, slightly more than expected
item.description: China's exports grew slightly more than expected in December, while imports rose less than expected, according to customs data released on Friday.

item.title: Biden to nominate Sarah Bloom Raskin as vice chair for supervision at Fed; Lisa Cook and Philip Jefferson as governors
item.description: President Joe Biden will nominate Sarah Bloom Raskin to be the Federal Reserve's next vice chair for supervision, a powerful regulatory role.

item.title: Dow drops 200 points Friday as bank stocks get hit, market posts second losing week to start 2022
item.description: JPMorgan and Citigroup slid after their earnings reports, weighing on the stock market.

item.title: Fed's Harker calls for 'action on inflation,' sees 3 or 4 rate hikes likely this year
item.description: Philadelphia Federal Reserve President Patrick Harker said he foresees three or four interest rate hikes this year as likely to fight inflation.

item.title: Stocks making the biggest moves midday: Ford, Snap, Virgin Galactic and more
item.description: These are the stocks posting the largest moves in midday trading.

item.title: Crypto exchange Gemini pushes into wealth management with acquisition of BITRIA
item.description: The rise of crypto has created the need for ways to provide wealthy investors access through familiar wealth management vehicles.

item.title: Stocks making the biggest moves premarket: Delta Air Lines, Moderna, Virgin Orbit and others
item.description: These are the stocks posting the largest moves before the bell.

item.title: Dow falls nearly 200 points, Nasdaq snaps three-day winning streak as tech rally stumbles
item.description: Stocks slid on Thursday, marking the end of a three-day rally for tech shares.

item.title: Despite higher wages, inflation gave the average worker a 2.4% pay cut last year
item.description: Higher consumer prices in 2021 erased the raises many workers got from their employers. However, wage growth outstripped inflation for some lower earners.

item.title: Stocks making the biggest moves midday: DoorDash, Biogen, T. Rowe Price, Crocs and more
item.description: These are the stocks posting the largest moves in midday trading.

item.title: Robinhood says it will offer permanent remote working to most employees
item.description: Robinhood is headquartered in Melo Park, California; however, for a large segment of Robinhood employees there will be no location or in-office requirement.

item.title: Stocks making the biggest moves premarket: DoorDash, Didi, Philips and others
item.description: These are the stocks posting the largest moves before the bell.

item.title: Kim Kardashian and Floyd Mayweather sued by investors over alleged crypto scam
item.description: A class action lawsuit accuses Kim Kardashian and Floyd Mayweather of artificially inflating the price of the cryptocurrency EthereumMax.

item.title: UBS says the Fed is likely behind the curve in shrinking its balance sheet
item.description: Fed Chairman Jerome Powell said Tuesday that he expects a series of interest rate hikes this year.

item.title: Goldman cuts China GDP target for 2022 â€” and exports aren't the problem
item.description: Goldman Sachs cut its 2022 forecast for China's economic growth Tuesday in expectation of increased restrictions on business activity to contain omicron.

item.title: Stocks rise, Nasdaq gains for third straight day despite red-hot inflation report
item.description: Wall Street shook off the highest consumer price index increase in nearly 40 years on Wednesday.

item.title: Fed Chair Powell says rate hikes, tighter policy will be needed to control inflation
item.description: Federal Reserve Chairman Jerome Powell declared Tuesday that the economy is both healthy enough and in need of tighter monetary policy.

item.title: Stocks making the biggest moves midday: General Electric, Rivian, Illumina and more
item.description: These are the stocks posting the largest moves in midday trading.

item.title: Worried a Covid test you buy online might be fake? Here are 3 ways to protect yourself
item.description: The Federal Trade Commission outlined ways consumers can protect themselves as scammers take advantage of high demand for at-home rapid tests.

item.title: Watch Fed Chair Jerome Powell testify live at his Senate confirmation hearing
item.description: Federal Reserve Chairman Jerome Powell testifies Tuesday before the Senate Banking Committee as part of his confirmation process.

item.title: Fintech start-up MX names new CEO as firm prepares for sale or IPO
item.description: MX is one of a handful of infrastructure companies that have helped facilitate the growth of the fintech ecosystem in recent years.

item.title: Stocks making the biggest moves in the premarket: Illumina, Rivian, Juniper Networks and more
item.description: The stocks making the biggest moves in premarket trading include Illumina, Rivian, Juniper Networks, and more.

item.title: Shimao pushes back on media reports, says it's in talks for property sales to help resolve debt crisis
item.description: Chinese real estate developer Shimao Group Holdings pushed back Tuesday on reports of default and sales of prime property.
